timeline.bodyText:
Can we also add the support of checking System properties and environment variable?
This is to allow more flexible way to config the application.
As usually in kubernetes environment, people may store these credential as a Secrets then import as Environment Variables.
timeline.author: xiangfu0

replies.bodyText: That makes sense. So should I create like levels of fallbacks i.e. first check Env, then System properties and finally the configuration given?
replies.author: KKcorps

replies.bodyText:
yes, just the order should be reverse, if people specify the config, then we should always honor that. If configs are not existed, then we check system properties. if system properties doesn't exist, then we  check env var.
Also this needs to be documented :)
Thanks!
replies.author: xiangfu0
